attributes.title: If I could give 0 stars I would
attributes.review: super slow app and always crashes whenever I try and it use it overall just super bad

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!
attributes.review: if i could give this zero stars i would. this app is nothing like i’ve expected it to be. when i opened the app it said “keep america great”, what lies!! if an app is going to lie to me, i don’t want it! 😡😡

attributes.title: DJT IS A TREASONOUS TRAITOR
attributes.review: He’s a liar and a cheater and a predator and a horrible human being who doesn’t deserve to be president he deserves to be in prison for all the horrible things he’s done and said he’s ruining our country and peoples lives and he needs to go to jail forever #BLACKLIVESMATTER ✊🏼✊🏻✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: The most pointless app ever.
attributes.review: This app took TWO DAYS to download. Not to mention the app doesn’t even work. When I open the app it’s just nothing but a white screen. Unacceptable.

attributes.title: This app is TERRIBLE
attributes.review: The app is so laggy and full of propaganda. Do not download this app. It is a waste of time to try to get you to vote for trump. When in reality it doesn’t even do that job. I repeat do not download this app.

attributes.title: UGHH!!!!🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded! When I first opened it up, a little tyrannical orange face popped up on my screen and I wanted to throw up! It is disgusting and full of fake news by uneducated dumb republican losers. Do not download this ever!!🤬🤬🤢🤮🤮👿👿

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app steals all of your data and makes it so your phone is super slow and disgusting. Then it sends you texts over and over again and tells you to vote for trump!!  ITS HORRIBLE

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: All of my banking info was stolen right after I downloaded this app! Also very slow and for some reason it made my phone overheat.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It was really hard to download and to sign up. The app is not easy to use and it’s so confusing. It could be way better!

attributes.title: Horribleee
attributes.review: It toke way to long to download and I tried so many times to try to download it but it kept on not showing up on my screen. I don’t tecommend downloading this app!!!!
